data.actual_result: Thumbnails appear, but no horizontal scrollbar is present to allow user to slide images left and right
data.expected_result: Thumbnails appear,, extending to the right of the visible screen with a horizontal scrollbar showing, allowing your to slide the results left and right
data.short_description: In Firefox, no horizontal scrollbar when running /giphy
data.steps_to_repro: - open chat channel in Firefox - type "/giphy SearchPattern"
